Posts.EditableText: Hey, the name's Valerie. I just started working with Quest yesterday and thought it was going fine. I've looked through the quest guide and didn't get much help. How do you use an object on another object, like for example, uh, putting batteries into a radio? And how do you make the music loop? I've checked the loop box and everything but it still only repeats the music once.

Posts.EditableText:
[quote:1qtiq92x]putting batteries into a radio?[/quote:1qtiq92x]

Make object: batteries
Make object: radio

Make it possible to take: batteries
Use use/give tab at object batteries and use 'Use this on other object' radio. You should be able to run a script then.

Edit: I have noticed many bugs in the online version of Quest, including Use/Give, it may be smart to make custom verbs. And since you have full control over 'em, you can do what you want and you don't have Use/Give 'limits'!
